all_commands:
Enter the commands name you want to look up:
 authors
 tasks 
 test
 tests
 run
 show
 Or enter a blank line to exit.
run: shows all authors with their tasks and launches the chosen file
show: shows all authors with their tasks and shows all the code contained in the selected file
test: shows all authors with their tasks and runs the test in the selected file
user_tests: shows all authors with their tests and launches the selected file
